com.tedros.fxapi.annotation.effect

Annotation Type TBloom


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value={FIELD,ANNOTATION_TYPE})
public @interface TBloom
     A high-level effect that makes brighter portions 
 of the input image appear to glow, based on a 
 configurable threshold.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.Class<? extends ITEffectBuilder<javafx.scene.effect.Bloom>> builder
      Custom class builder for this Effect, setting this will ignore all others properties.
      java.lang.Class<? extends ITEffectBuilder> input
      Sets the value of the property input.
      java.lang.Class<? extends ITEffectParse> parser
      The parser class for this annotation.
      double threshold
      Sets the value of the property input.

    • Element Detail

      • parser

        public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends ITEffectParse> parser
         The parser class for this annotation.
 
 Default value:
 com.tedros.fxapi.annotation.parser.TEffectParser.class
        Default:
        com.tedros.fxapi.annotation.parser.TEffectParser.class

      • builder

        public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends ITEffectBuilder<javafx.scene.effect.Bloom>> builder
         Custom class builder for this Effect, 
 setting this will ignore all others properties.
 
 Default value: null
        Default:
        com.tedros.fxapi.annotation.effect.TBloom.NullEffectBuilder.class

      • input

        public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends ITEffectBuilder> input
         Sets the value of the property input.
 
 Property description:
 
 The input for this Effect. If set to null, or left unspecified, 
 a graphical image of the Node to which the Effect is attached 
 will be used as the input.
 
 Default value: null
        Default:
        com.tedros.fxapi.effect.ITEffectBuilder.class

      • threshold

        public abstract double threshold
         Sets the value of the property input.
 
 Property description:
 
 The threshold value controls the minimum luminosity 
 value of the pixels that will be made to glow.
 
       Min: 0.0
       Max: 1.0
   Default: 0.3
  Identity: n/a
 
 Default value: 0.3
        Default:
        0.3
